verbLexeme: 1. To operate the brake on a vehicle. English = brake.
2. Of a vehicle, to go slower because the brake has been operated. English = brake.
nominalLexeme: 1. The device in a vehicle that is used to make it go slower or stop. Often it is operated by pressing down on it with your foot. English = brake.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: pushing down on the brake pedal.
